title: Explainable artificial intelligence in autonomous vehicles: Prospects and Future Direction

abstract: Autonomous driving (AD) has become one of the major key research directions for finding smart mobility solutions. Recently, there has been an increasing demand for the development of autonomous vehicles (AVs) aiming at safer and ecologically …
